content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
My parents are constantly undermining my self-worth.
That is a difficult situation to be in, I know that you are feeling stressed out and resentful. That must be a very hard situation to go through. Have you spoken to your parents about their problems?
I tried but they are not open-mined enough to take my perspective.
I know how difficult that can be. It is unfortunate that they aren' t able to come to you to talk. Have you had any open conversations with your parents about how you are feeling?
